subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Bears are the nation’s most accurate 3-point-shooting team, but they lack tenacity. They find that in Jorge Gutierrez, their freshman guard from Chihuahua, Mexico.
snippet: The Bears are the nation’s most accurate 3-point-shooting team, but they lack tenacity. They find that in Jorge Gutierrez, their freshman guard from Chihuahua, Mexico.
